Water Quality and Conservation
Our facilities generally minimize 
water use, and we remain committed 
to reducing our water usage.
§
Bathrooms remodeled with hands
 -
free flush 
valves and faucets 
§
Converted oven rooms to chilled water system 
saving over 30,000 gallons of water per day
§
On
-
going investment in projects to reduce 
water usage
